author: mxmanghi
msg: * src/experimental/mod_rivet.c: Rivet channel is set as stdout and as such is released
when its refCount drops below 2. Therefore we cannot unregister it for each interpreter
unless we remove it as stdout when terminating the thread just before unregistering
the channel and deleting the intepreters

author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-4208 - add links to tests on the JUnit servlet page - contributed by Ben Helleman, thanks!
